questions:
What is the photo about?
   A) Nature and landscapes
   B) Daily life and people
   C) Art and culture
   D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
   A) In a city park
   B) At the beach
   C) Inside an aquarium
   D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
   A) A peaceful nature scene
   B) A sports event
   C) An underwater scene
   D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
   A) A group of people
   B) A school of fish
   C) A landscape
   D) A building

What type of fish is prominently featured in the photo?
   A) Goldfish
   B) Clownfish
   C) Betta fish
   D) Angelfish

What is in the center of the photo?
   A) A person
   B) A clownfish
   C) A tree
   D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
   A) A forest
   B) A cityscape
   C) Blue water
   D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
   A) Clownfish and sea anemones
   B) A park bench
   C) A sandy beach
   D) A road

What colors are most prominent in the photo?
    A) Green and brown
    B) Red and yellow
    C) Blue and orange
    D) Black and white

How many clownfish can be seen in the photo?
    A) One
    B) Three
    C) Five
    D) Seven

What type of plant is visible in the photo?
    A) Seaweed
    B) Coral
    C) Sea anemone
    D) Kelp

What is the texture of the background?
    A) Smooth and glassy
    B) Rough and rocky
    C) Soft and sandy
    D) Fuzzy and green

What is the behavior of the clownfish in the photo?
    A) They are swimming in open water
    B) They are hiding among the sea anemones
    C) They are jumping out of the water
    D) They are resting on the seabed

What kind of habitat is depicted in the photo?
    A) Desert
    B) Forest
    C) Marine
    D) Arctic

What is the purpose of the sea anemones in the photo?
    A) They are a food source for the fish
    B) They provide shelter and protection for the fish
    C) They are used for decoration
    D) They are predators of the fish

What is the color pattern of the clownfish?
    A) Solid blue
    B) Striped orange and white
    C) Spotted green
    D) Plain yellow

What is the primary activity of the fish in the photo?
    A) Feeding
    B) Swimming
    C) Sleeping
    D) Mating

What is the most striking feature of the photo?
    A) The vibrant colors
    B) The detailed landscape
    C) The architectural elements
    D) The human expressions

What is the contrast like in the photo?
    A) High contrast with sharp edges
    B) Low contrast with soft transitions
    C) Medium contrast with balanced tones
    D) No contrast, everything blends together

What is the depth of field like in the photo?
    A) Shallow with a blurred background
    B) Deep with everything in focus
    C) Medium with some background blur
    D) No depth, everything is flat

What can be inferred about the setting based on the photo?
    A) It is a tropical rainforest
    B) It is an underwater scene
    C) It is a desert landscape
    D) It is a snowy mountain

What is the relationship between the clownfish and the sea anemones?
    A) The clownfish eat the sea anemones
    B) The sea anemones protect the clownfish
    C) The clownfish avoid the sea anemones
    D) The sea anemones are predators of the clownfish

What is the role of the sea anemones in the ecosystem depicted in the photo?
    A) Producers
    B) Consumers
    C) Decomposers
    D) Symbiotic partners

How many sea anemones are visible in the photo?
    A) One
    B) Two
    C) Three
    D) Four

What is the primary texture of the sea anemones in the photo?
    A) Smooth and sleek
    B) Rough and jagged
    C) Soft and wavy
    D) Hard and spiky

What is the overall composition of the photo?
    A) Balanced with equal elements on both sides
    B) Asymmetrical with more elements on one side
    C) Centered with the main focus in the middle
    D) Scattered with no clear focus

What is the primary element in the background of the photo?
    A) Other fish
    B) Coral reefs
    C) Blue water
    D) Sand

What is the primary activity of the sea anemones in the photo?
    A) Moving around
    B) Staying stationary
    C) Catching prey
    D) Reproducing

What kind of water is depicted in the photo?
    A) Freshwater
    B) Saltwater
    C) Brackish water
    D) Polluted water

What is the most prominent feature of the clownfish in the photo?
    A) Their size
    B) Their color pattern
    C) Their behavior
    D) Their habitat

What can be inferred about the habitat of the clownfish based on the photo?
    A) It is a freshwater habitat
    B) It is a saltwater habitat
    C) It is a brackish water habitat
    D) It is a polluted habitat

What is the primary interaction depicted in the photo?
    A) Predator-prey
    B) Symbiotic relationship
    C) Competitive interaction
    D) Parasitic relationship

What is the main visual element that stands out in the photo?
    A) The detailed textures of the sea anemones
    B) The vibrant colors of the clownfish
    C) The clear blue water
    D) The rocky background

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) Trees and plants
B) Clownfish and sea anemones
C) Birds and sky
D) Mountains and rivers

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings and cars
B) Open water and sky
C) Blue water and sea anemones
D) A forest

Which of the following best describes the photo's composition?
A) Symmetrical and balanced
B) Chaotic and cluttered
C) Focused with a clear subject
D) Abstract and unclear
